channel.title: Updating Tor Browser is reinstalling AppArmor?
channel.description:
I can't seem to find the answer to this question. If you have the app armor rules installed for the tor-browser, do you need to reinstall this everytime you update the tor browser?
I am talking about this command: sudo apt-get install apparmor-profile-torbrowser

item.title: Updating Tor Browser is reinstalling AppArmor?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Updating Tor Browser is reinstalling AppArmor?
